segments.text: This kitchen flood is disgusting; water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron is probably getting soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying that plate so meticulously, ignoring the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's a slippery mess now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids raiding the cookie jar— greedy little ones.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks filthy from all the use, and it's tipping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's just standing there, begging for her piece.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Crumbly cookies all over the counter soon, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is nice, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will make everything moldy— ugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to snap out of it before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
